topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558af872636872640c000680#post_558af872636872640c000680
"~When you walk away
You don't hear me say 'Please, oh baby, don't go.'
Simple and clean is the way that you're making me feel tonight
It's hard to let it go~

~You're giving me too many things
Lately, you're all I need
You smiled at me and said
"Don't get me wrong, I love you, but does that mean I have to meet your father?"
When we are older you'll understand
What I meant when I said
"No, I don't think life is quite that simple~"
